name: Robert Shapiro
description: Renowned for his role in the O.J. Simpson trial, Robert Shapiro is a veteran criminal defense attorney with over five decades of high-profile legal experience.

name: Johnnie Cochran
description: A passionate advocate for civil rights and a powerful courtroom presence, Johnnie Cochran famously led the defense team in the O.J. Simpson case.

name: F. Lee Bailey
description: A legendary trial lawyer known for his sharp cross-examinations, F. Lee Bailey represented some of the most controversial figures in American legal history.

name: David Boies
description: David Boies has shaped major litigation in the U.S., from the Microsoft antitrust case to Bush v. Gore, making him one of the nation's most influential trial lawyers.

name: Preet Bharara
description: Former U.S. Attorney for the Southern District of New York, Preet Bharara built a reputation for aggressively prosecuting financial crimes and political corruption.

name: Drew Findling
description: Known as the 'hashtag lawyer' for his social media savvy, Drew Findling represents high-profile celebrities and hip-hop artists in serious criminal cases.

name: Dan K. Webb
description: A former U.S. Attorney and a go-to litigator for Fortune 500 companies, Dan Webb is revered for his leadership in complex corporate investigations and trials.

name: Mark Geragos
description: Mark Geragos is a fixture in celebrity legal defense, handling cases for figures like Michael Jackson and Winona Ryder, while also tackling major civil suits.

name: Thomas Mesereau
description: Best known for defending Michael Jackson in his 2005 trial, Thomas Mesereau has a track record of winning complex and high-stakes criminal cases.

name: Alan Dershowitz
description: A Harvard law professor and prolific author, Alan Dershowitz is one of America's most recognizable legal scholars, often involved in landmark constitutional debates.

name: Robert K. Hur
description: As a former U.S. Attorney and Special Counsel, Robert Hur brings a wealth of experience in sensitive government investigations and high-profile white-collar cases.

name: William A. Burck
description: William Burck is a leading attorney in defending political figures and corporations in investigations and congressional inquiries, known for his strategic counsel.
